section.section: In this section the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Pilot program" means the child care centers established in State-occupied buildings or State complexes under this section.

text.section: There is a pilot program for child care in State-occupied buildings and State complexes.
The Department shall administer the pilot program established under this section.

The pilot program shall be:
operated in at least 1 State-occupied building or State complex where 700 or more State employees are located;
established to accommodate at least 29 children at each location; and
established for at least 3 years.

section.section: The Department shall contract with child care providers to operate the child care centers established under this section.
The child care provider may not be held responsible for providing the necessary space for the operation of the child care center.
